leaf_cluster.leaf_cluster_name: 神经科学-神经影像与连接组生态
leaf_cluster.task_chain: 预处理→配准→连接组→统计→评测
leaf_cluster.tool_form: pipelines + 图分析 + 可视化

queries: [WEB] medical image registration deep learning github

tools.name: iCVMapp3r
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning based brain extraction (skull-stripping) algorithm
tools.detailed_description: A brain extraction tool using Convolutional Neural Networks (CNNs) developed by AICONSlab, designed for skull-stripping in MRI analysis.

tools.name: ANTs
tools.one_line_profile: Advanced Normalization Tools for medical image registration and segmentation
tools.detailed_description: A state-of-the-art medical image processing toolkit providing advanced algorithms for image registration, segmentation, and template building. It is widely used in neuroimaging for normalizing brain images to standard spaces.

tools.name: ANTsPy
tools.one_line_profile: Python interface for Advanced Normalization Tools (ANTs)
tools.detailed_description: A Python library wrapping the ANTs C++ toolkit, enabling fast and efficient medical image registration, segmentation, and visualization within Python workflows.

tools.name: ANTsR
tools.one_line_profile: R interface for Advanced Normalization Tools (ANTs)
tools.detailed_description: An R package providing an interface to the ANTs library, allowing statistical analysis and image processing of medical imaging data directly within the R environment.

tools.name: BrainExtraction
tools.one_line_profile: Brain extraction application based on ANTsRNet
tools.detailed_description: A specific application within the ANTsX ecosystem for performing brain extraction (skull stripping) on MRI data.

tools.name: qsm_sstv
tools.one_line_profile: BIDS app for QSM processing using single step total variation
tools.detailed_description: A BIDS-compliant application for processing Quantitative Susceptibility Mapping (QSM) data, specifically designed for Siemens 7T data using a single-step total variation method.

tools.name: SynthSeg
tools.one_line_profile: Contrast-agnostic segmentation of MRI scans
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning tool for segmentation of brain MRI scans that is robust to variations in contrast and resolution, enabling analysis of heterogeneous clinical data.

tools.name: BRAINSTools
tools.one_line_profile: Suite of tools for medical image processing
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive suite of command-line tools for medical image analysis, including registration, segmentation, and tissue classification, focused on brain analysis.

tools.name: MIRTK
tools.one_line_profile: Medical Image Registration ToolKit
tools.detailed_description: A research-focused toolkit for image registration, reconstruction, and analysis, providing a library and command-line tools for medical imaging tasks.

tools.name: BluePyEfe
tools.one_line_profile: Electrophysiological feature extraction library
tools.detailed_description: A Python library developed by the Blue Brain Project for extracting electrical features from electrophysiological recordings of neurons.

tools.name: Blue Brain Search
tools.one_line_profile: Text mining toolbox for neuroscience
tools.detailed_description: A text mining and semantic search toolbox designed to extract structured information from scientific literature, supporting knowledge discovery in neuroscience.

tools.name: BraTS Algorithms
tools.one_line_profile: Collection of top-performing BraTS segmentation algorithms
tools.detailed_description: A repository providing implementations of top-performing algorithms from the Brain Tumor Segmentation (BraTS) challenges, serving as a benchmark and toolkit for tumor segmentation.

tools.name: TVB-Pypeline
tools.one_line_profile: Automated MRI processing pipeline for The Virtual Brain
tools.detailed_description: A Python-based automated MRI processing pipeline using Nipype, designed to prepare data for The Virtual Brain (TVB) simulations.

tools.name: FuNP
tools.one_line_profile: Fusion of Neuroimaging Preprocessing Pipeline
tools.detailed_description: A pipeline tool for the fusion and preprocessing of neuroimaging data, facilitating standardized analysis workflows.

tools.name: BrainMaGe
tools.one_line_profile: Brain extraction with multiple MRI modalities
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning tool for brain extraction (skull stripping) capable of handling single and multiple MRI modalities, including in the presence of abnormalities.

tools.name: HD-BET
tools.one_line_profile: Robust automated brain extraction tool
tools.detailed_description: A widely used deep learning-based brain extraction tool that offers robust performance across various MRI sequence types and in the presence of pathologies.

tools.name: DTHB3D_Reg
tools.one_line_profile: 3D non-rigid image registration using THB-Splines
tools.detailed_description: A MATLAB package for performing 3D non-rigid medical image registration using truncated hierarchical B-splines, offering adaptive local refinement.

tools.name: ROBEXBrainExtraction
tools.one_line_profile: 3D Slicer extension for ROBEX brain extraction
tools.detailed_description: A 3D Slicer extension that integrates the ROBEX (Robust Brain Extraction) algorithm, allowing users to perform skull stripping within the Slicer environment.

tools.name: antx2
tools.one_line_profile: Animal MRI brain registration pipeline
tools.detailed_description: A MATLAB-based pipeline for registering animal (mouse, rat, shrew, cat) MRI brain data to standard atlases, supporting both in-vivo and ex-vivo data.

tools.name: RABIES
tools.one_line_profile: Rodent fMRI preprocessing and analysis pipeline
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive software pipeline for the preprocessing and analysis of rodent fMRI data, addressing specific challenges in small animal neuroimaging.

tools.name: Networks_for_Affine_Medical_Image_Registration
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning networks for affine medical image registration
tools.detailed_description: A collection of deep learning network architectures specifically designed for affine registration of medical images, facilitating automated alignment tasks.

tools.name: BME-X
tools.one_line_profile: Foundation model for Brain MRI enhancement and downstream tasks
tools.detailed_description: BME-X is a foundation model designed to enhance magnetic resonance images (MRI) and support downstream tasks such as segmentation, registration, and diagnosis.

tools.name: BIBSnet
tools.one_line_profile: BIDS App for infant brain MRI segmentation using nnU-Net
tools.detailed_description: A BIDS Application that utilizes an infant-trained nnU-Net model to create anatomical MRI segmentations and masks, designed for integration into processing pipelines.

tools.name: abcd-hcp-pipeline
tools.one_line_profile: BIDS application for processing functional MRI data
tools.detailed_description: A robust BIDS application for processing functional MRI data, designed to handle variability in scanners, acquisition protocols, and age groups, based on HCP standards.

tools.name: dcan_bold_processing
tools.one_line_profile: Functional connectivity preprocessing for resting state fMRI
tools.detailed_description: MATLAB tools for functional connectivity preprocessing of resting-state fMRI outputs generated by dcan-fmri-pipelines.

tools.name: infant-abcd-bids-pipeline
tools.one_line_profile: fMRI processing pipeline optimized for human infants
tools.detailed_description: A specialized version of the abcd-hcp-pipeline tailored for processing fMRI data from human infants.

tools.name: nhp-abcd-bids-pipeline
tools.one_line_profile: fMRI processing pipeline for non-human primates
tools.detailed_description: A specialized version of the abcd-hcp-pipeline adapted for processing fMRI data from non-human primates (e.g., macaques).

tools.name: BrainPrint-legacy
tools.one_line_profile: Shape analysis tools for neuroimaging data
tools.detailed_description: Python scripts for performing shape analysis on neuroimaging data, wrapping around shapeDNA and FreeSurfer functionalities.

tools.name: FastSurfer
tools.one_line_profile: Fast and accurate deep learning based neuroimaging pipeline
tools.detailed_description: A fast and accurate deep learning pipeline for whole brain segmentation and cortical surface reconstruction, serving as a rapid alternative to FreeSurfer.

tools.name: FatSegNet
tools.one_line_profile: Deep CNN for abdominal adipose tissue segmentation on Dixon MRI
tools.detailed_description: A deep convolutional neural network designed for the segmentation of abdominal adipose tissue using Dixon MRI scans.

tools.name: FastSurfer-LIT
tools.one_line_profile: Lesion inpainting tool for structural MRI
tools.detailed_description: FastSurfer Lesion Inpainting Tool (LIT) designed to handle whole brain segmentation and cortical surface reconstruction in the presence of tumors or surgical cavities.

tools.name: fslmer
tools.one_line_profile: Linear mixed-effects analysis for FreeSurfer data
tools.detailed_description: R package for performing univariate and mass-univariate linear mixed-effects analysis on FreeSurfer imaging data.

tools.name: fsqc
tools.one_line_profile: Quality control scripts for FreeSurfer/FastSurfer data
tools.detailed_description: A collection of scripts for performing quality control on structural MRI data processed with FreeSurfer or FastSurfer.

tools.name: DeepReg
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning framework for medical image registration
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive framework for medical image registration using deep learning, supporting various network architectures and registration tasks.

tools.name: freesurfer_statsurf_display
tools.one_line_profile: MATLAB tool for displaying FreeSurfer surface statistics
tools.detailed_description: A MATLAB toolbox for visualizing regional statistics directly on FreeSurfer cortical surfaces.

tools.name: mantis
tools.one_line_profile: Morphologically adaptive neonate tissue segmentation toolbox
tools.detailed_description: A toolbox for SPM8/12 designed for the segmentation of neonate brain tissues using morphologically adaptive methods.

tools.name: fs_LR_32
tools.one_line_profile: Standard human cortical surface-based template
tools.detailed_description: A standard left-right symmetric human cortical surface template (~32k vertices) for neuroimaging analyses, compatible with FreeSurfer.

tools.name: surfAnalysis
tools.one_line_profile: Surface-based analysis functions for neuroimaging
tools.detailed_description: A collection of MATLAB functions for conducting surface-based analyses of neuroimaging data, utilizing FreeSurfer and Connectome Workbench tools.

tools.name: MOOSE
tools.one_line_profile: Multi-organ objective segmentation for whole-body PET/CT
tools.detailed_description: A data-centric AI pipeline based on nn-UNet for generating multilabel organ segmentations from whole-body 18F-FDG PET/CT images.

tools.name: ENIGMA-FreeSurfer-protocol
tools.one_line_profile: Protocols for ENIGMA FreeSurfer analysis
tools.detailed_description: Standardized protocols and scripts for the analysis of subcortical volume, cortical thickness, and surface area data within FreeSurfer ROIs for ENIGMA studies.

tools.name: edieviz
tools.one_line_profile: Information extraction from brain radiology reports
tools.detailed_description: A tool for extracting structured information from unstructured brain radiology reports, facilitating clinical data analysis.

tools.name: Deep_MRI_brain_extraction
tools.one_line_profile: 3D CNN for MRI brain extraction
tools.detailed_description: A 3D convolutional neural network implementation for automated brain extraction (skull stripping) from MRI scans.

tools.name: HALFpipe
tools.one_line_profile: User-friendly pipeline for reproducible fMRI analysis
tools.detailed_description: ENIGMA HALFpipe is a software tool designed to facilitate reproducible analysis of fMRI data, providing a semi-automated workflow.

tools.name: NiBetaSeries
tools.one_line_profile: Nipype implementation of BetaSeries Correlations
tools.detailed_description: A Python tool implementing BetaSeries Correlations using Nipype, allowing for task-based functional connectivity analysis.

tools.name: NuisanceRegression
tools.one_line_profile: Post-processing regression for fMRIPrep outputs
tools.detailed_description: A tool to perform smoothing, filtering, and nuisance regression on fMRI data that has been preprocessed with fMRIPrep.

tools.name: MU-Net
tools.one_line_profile: Multi-task U-Net for mouse brain MRI segmentation
tools.detailed_description: A Multi-task U-Net model designed for the simultaneous segmentation and skull-stripping of mouse brain MRI data.

tools.name: elikopy
tools.one_line_profile: Python library for diffusion imaging processing
tools.detailed_description: A Python library aimed at easing the processing of diffusion imaging data for microstructural analysis.

tools.name: 3d-mri-brain-tumor-segmentation
tools.one_line_profile: 3D MRI brain tumor segmentation implementation
tools.detailed_description: A high-star Keras implementation of 3D MRI brain tumor segmentation using autoencoder regularization, serving as a reference solver.

tools.name: SAMRI
tools.one_line_profile: Small Animal Magnetic Resonance Imaging workflows
tools.detailed_description: A Python package providing workflows and tools for processing Small Animal Magnetic Resonance Imaging data.

tools.name: xnnppx
tools.one_line_profile: Integration tool for XNAT and Nipype
tools.detailed_description: A tool facilitating the integration between XNAT imaging informatics platform and Nipype processing pipelines.

tools.name: Brain-tumor-segmentation
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning approach for brain tumor MRI segmentation
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning-based solver for segmenting brain tumors from MRI scans, providing a reusable implementation.

tools.name: s3
tools.one_line_profile: Skull stripping and brain tissue segmentation tool
tools.detailed_description: A Python-based tool for automated skull stripping and brain tissue segmentation in MRI scans, facilitating neuroimaging preprocessing.

tools.name: KUL_FWT
tools.one_line_profile: Automated tractography workflow using MRTrix3 and FreeSurfer
tools.detailed_description: A shell-based workflow for performing automated tractography using MRTrix3 CSD, leveraging subject-specific parcellations from FreeSurfer.

tools.name: KUL_VBG
tools.one_line_profile: Workflow for FreeSurfer recon-all on glioma brains
tools.detailed_description: A specialized workflow designed to enable the standard FreeSurfer recon-all pipeline to function correctly on brain images containing gliomas.

tools.name: pyLAR
tools.one_line_profile: Low-rank-plus-sparse Atlas-to-image Registration framework
tools.detailed_description: Python implementation of the Low-rank-plus-sparse (LAR) framework for atlas-to-image registration, applied in medical image analysis.

tools.name: cmp_nipype
tools.one_line_profile: Nipype interface for Connectome Mapper
tools.detailed_description: A repository hosting the Nipype-based implementation for the Connectome Mapper, facilitating multi-scale connectome processing pipelines.

tools.name: Opt-GO-3D-2D-Registration
tools.one_line_profile: Optimization-GradientOrientation based 3D/2D registration
tools.detailed_description: An algorithm implementation for 3D/2D medical image registration using optimization and gradient orientation techniques.

tools.name: HD-BET
tools.one_line_profile: High-performance MRI brain extraction tool
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning-based tool for robust and accurate brain extraction (skull stripping) from MRI images, developed by DKFZ.

tools.name: MITK-Diffusion
tools.one_line_profile: Diffusion MRI analysis toolkit
tools.detailed_description: The official diffusion imaging component of the Medical Imaging Interaction Toolkit (MITK), providing tools for DWI processing and analysis.

tools.name: RobustCartilageSegmentation
tools.one_line_profile: Knee cartilage segmentation from DESS MRI
tools.detailed_description: A tool for segmenting knee cartilage tissues from DESS MRI scans, supporting musculoskeletal imaging research.

tools.name: mCTSegmentation
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning segmentation for micro-CT osteochondral tissues
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning based tool for segmenting tidemarks in human osteochondral tissues imaged with micro-computed tomography.

tools.name: MRtrix3
tools.one_line_profile: Advanced diffusion MRI analysis suite
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive set of tools for advanced diffusion MRI analyses, including CSD, probabilistic tractography, and fixel-based analysis.

tools.name: DMMN
tools.one_line_profile: Deep Multi-Magnification Network for WSI segmentation
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning network for multi-class tissue segmentation of whole slide images (WSI) in computational pathology.

tools.name: macapype
tools.one_line_profile: Primate neuroimaging segmentation pipelines
tools.detailed_description: A Nipype-based pipeline package specifically designed for segmentation and processing of non-human primate (NHP) brain images.

tools.name: brain-segmentation
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning skull stripping and abnormality segmentation
tools.detailed_description: A U-Net based tool for skull stripping and FLAIR abnormality segmentation in brain MRI, providing trained models and inference scripts.

tools.name: MeshProcessing
tools.one_line_profile: NIfTI binary map to STL mesh converter
tools.detailed_description: A utility tool to convert binary segmentation maps (NIfTI) into 3D mesh formats (STL), useful for visualization and modeling.

tools.name: GeoSpatial-UNET
tools.one_line_profile: Vector map generation from aerial imagery
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning tool using U-Net for semantic segmentation and building extraction from satellite/UAV orthoimages.

tools.name: tvb-ukbb
tools.one_line_profile: TheVirtualBrain pipeline for UK Biobank
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of TheVirtualBrain (TVB) processing pipeline specifically tailored for UK Biobank neuroimaging data.

tools.name: MIALSRTK
tools.one_line_profile: Fetal MRI super-resolution toolkit
tools.detailed_description: The Medical Image Analysis Laboratory Super-Resolution ToolKit (MIALSRTK) provides processing tools for motion-robust super-resolution reconstruction of fetal MRI.

tools.name: Brain-Tumor-Segmentation
tools.one_line_profile: Attention-Guided 2D UNet for brain tumor segmentation
tools.detailed_description: A popular implementation of an Attention-Guided U-Net model for automatic brain tumor segmentation, widely used as a baseline or solver.

tools.name: CorrMLP
tools.one_line_profile: Correlation-aware MLP for deformable registration
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of CorrMLP, a deep learning network for deformable medical image registration, recognized as a CVPR 2024 Best Paper Candidate.

tools.name: MuscleMap
tools.one_line_profile: Whole-body quantitative muscle MRI analysis tools
tools.detailed_description: Open-source tools and resources for the analysis of whole-body quantitative MRI of muscle, supported by the MuscleMap consortium.

tools.name: PaNSegNet
tools.one_line_profile: Pancreas segmentation network for CT and MRI
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning framework for large-scale multi-center segmentation of the pancreas from both CT and MRI imaging data.

tools.name: DESIGNER-v2
tools.one_line_profile: Diffusion MRI preprocessing and estimation pipeline
tools.detailed_description: Pipeline for Diffusion parameter EStImation with Gibbs and NoisE Removal (DESIGNER), focusing on high-quality dMRI preprocessing.

tools.name: DARTS
tools.one_line_profile: DenseUnet-based Automatic Rapid Tool for brain Segmentation
tools.detailed_description: A DenseUnet-based tool designed for rapid and automatic segmentation of brain structures from MRI data.

tools.name: GeomxTools
tools.one_line_profile: Analysis tools for NanoString GeoMx DSP data
tools.detailed_description: An R package for reading, quality control, and normalization of NanoString GeoMx Digital Spatial Profiler (DSP) data.

tools.name: Neurita/pypes
tools.one_line_profile: Reusable neuroimaging pipelines library based on Nipype
tools.detailed_description: A collection of reusable neuroimaging processing pipelines built on top of the Nipype framework, facilitating standardized analysis workflows.

tools.name: BIDSonym
tools.one_line_profile: BIDS App for pseudo-anonymization of neuroimaging data
tools.detailed_description: A BIDS App designed to perform pseudo-anonymization on neuroimaging datasets, ensuring data privacy and compliance with sharing standards.

tools.name: BABS
tools.one_line_profile: BIDS App Bootstrap for running BIDS Apps on HPC clusters
tools.detailed_description: BIDS App Bootstrap (BABS) is a system for setting up and executing BIDS Apps on High Performance Computing (HPC) clusters, managing job submission and data organization.

tools.name: QSIPrep
tools.one_line_profile: Preprocessing pipeline for diffusion MRI data
tools.detailed_description: A robust and reproducible preprocessing pipeline for diffusion MRI (dMRI) data, handling artifacts, motion correction, and registration.

tools.name: XCP-D
tools.one_line_profile: Post-processing pipeline for fMRIPrep and HCP outputs
tools.detailed_description: A post-processing tool that takes outputs from fMRIPrep, NiBabies, or HCP pipelines and performs denoising, functional connectivity analysis, and quality control.

tools.name: SlicerFreeSurfer
tools.one_line_profile: 3D Slicer extension for importing FreeSurfer data
tools.detailed_description: An extension for 3D Slicer that enables the import, visualization, and analysis of FreeSurfer segmentation and surface models within the Slicer environment.

tools.name: prsonpipe
tools.one_line_profile: fMRI analysis pipeline from Princeton University
tools.detailed_description: A shell-based fMRI analysis pipeline used for processing neuroimaging data, likely tailored for specific institutional protocols.

tools.name: MIPCandy
tools.one_line_profile: Rapid experiment pipeline builder for PyTorch MIP models
tools.detailed_description: A tool designed to quickly generate and structure experiment pipelines for Medical Image Processing (MIP) models using PyTorch.

tools.name: Qoala-T
tools.one_line_profile: Supervised learning tool for FreeSurfer quality control
tools.detailed_description: A supervised learning tool designed to automate the quality control assessment of FreeSurfer segmented MRI data.

tools.name: HCPstyle-BOLDLagMappingAndCleaning
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for BOLD lag mapping and cleaning in fMRI
tools.detailed_description: A MATLAB-based pipeline for extracting and removing perfusion lag structures from 4D BOLD-fMRI data, following HCP-style protocols.

tools.name: slidesegmenter
tools.one_line_profile: Tissue and pen marking segmentation for whole slide images
tools.detailed_description: A Python package for segmenting tissue and removing pen markings from low-magnification whole slide images in digital pathology.

tools.name: Neurodocker
tools.one_line_profile: Generator for custom neuroimaging container images
tools.detailed_description: A command-line tool to generate custom Docker and Singularity files/images that include neuroimaging software (FSL, SPM, FreeSurfer, etc.) for reproducible research.

tools.name: load_confounds
tools.one_line_profile: Python library to load fMRIPrep confounds
tools.detailed_description: A Python library designed to easily load and filter confound variables generated by fMRIPrep for downstream analysis.

tools.name: SkullStripper
tools.one_line_profile: Skull stripping extension for 3D Slicer
tools.detailed_description: A 3D Slicer extension providing skull stripping functionality for structural MR images (T1 and T2).

tools.name: SimpleElastix
tools.one_line_profile: Multi-lingual medical image registration library
tools.detailed_description: A medical image registration library that extends SimpleITK with the elastix registration framework, supporting multiple languages.

tools.name: nBEST
tools.one_line_profile: Non-human primate Brain Extraction and Segmentation Toolbox
tools.detailed_description: An automated AI pipeline/toolbox for brain extraction and segmentation of non-human primate (NHP) MRI data across multiple species and sites.

tools.name: delaunay-watershed
tools.one_line_profile: Surface mesh reconstruction from 3D segmentation masks
tools.detailed_description: A Python package designed to reconstruct multimaterial nonmanifold surface meshes from 3D segmentation masks of tissues or nuclei.

tools.name: Timagetk
tools.one_line_profile: 3D and 2D image processing algorithms for tissue analysis
tools.detailed_description: A Python package providing 3D and 2D image processing algorithms specifically designed for tissue images, including segmentation and registration functionalities.

tools.name: NHP-BIDS
tools.one_line_profile: BIDS-compatible processing pipeline for Non-Human Primate MRI
tools.detailed_description: A pipeline for processing Non-Human Primate (NHP) MRI data (e.g., Retinotopy, Curve-tracing) utilizing NiPype and adhering to the BIDS format.

tools.name: NHP-Freesurfer
tools.one_line_profile: Surface generation and projection workflow for monkey brains
tools.detailed_description: Procedures and scripts to create monkey brain surfaces and project analysis results onto them, facilitating surface-based analysis in NHP research.

tools.name: Rodent-Skull-Stripping
tools.one_line_profile: General MRI skull-stripping tool for rodent data
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning-based tool designed for skull-stripping in rodent MRI data, trained on multi-center datasets to ensure generalization.

tools.name: CTseg
tools.one_line_profile: Brain CT segmentation and normalization toolbox
tools.detailed_description: A MATLAB toolbox for brain CT image segmentation, normalization, skull-stripping, and computation of total brain/intracranial volumes.

tools.name: mb
tools.one_line_profile: Group-wise diffeomorphic registration and segmentation
tools.detailed_description: A MATLAB implementation for group-wise diffeomorphic registration and segmentation of medical images, enabling population-based analysis.

tools.name: spm-hospital-preproc
tools.one_line_profile: Clinical neuroimaging preprocessing toolbox based on SPM12
tools.detailed_description: A MATLAB toolbox extending SPM12 for various preprocessing operations including registration, reslicing, denoising, and segmentation, tailored for clinical data.

tools.name: RAVE
tools.one_line_profile: High-performance medical image processing engine
tools.detailed_description: A processing engine for converting DICOM and NIfTI files into ML-ready formats, featuring intelligent windowing and compression for medical imaging data.

tools.name: ModeTv2
tools.one_line_profile: GPU-accelerated Motion Decomposition Transformer for registration
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning model (Transformer-based) for pairwise medical image registration, featuring GPU acceleration and motion decomposition.

tools.name: RDP
tools.one_line_profile: Recursive Deformable Pyramid Network for registration
tools.detailed_description: An unsupervised deep learning framework (Recursive Deformable Pyramid Network) for medical image registration.

tools.name: UniUSNet
tools.one_line_profile: Universal Ultrasound disease prediction and segmentation framework
tools.detailed_description: A promptable framework for simultaneous disease prediction and tissue segmentation in ultrasound imaging.

tools.name: Spatial-Normalization-of-Brain-PET-Images
tools.one_line_profile: Toolbox for spatial normalization of brain PET images
tools.detailed_description: A MATLAB toolbox dedicated to the spatial normalization of brain PET images, facilitating group analyses.

tools.name: DAUnet
tools.one_line_profile: Domain adaptation for MRI skull-stripping in newborns
tools.detailed_description: An unsupervised domain adaptation framework to transfer MRI skull-stripping capabilities from adult data to newborn data.

tools.name: brain_tissue_nuc_segm
tools.one_line_profile: Nuclear segmentation in fluorescent brain tissue
tools.detailed_description: A workflow for segmenting nuclear signals in fluorescently stained mouse brain tissue sections using fine-tuned Stardist 3D and Cellpose models.

tools.name: rsDenoise
tools.one_line_profile: Denoising pipeline for resting-state fMRI
tools.detailed_description: A dedicated pipeline for denoising resting-state fMRI data, likely handling artifact removal and signal cleaning.

tools.name: autoafids
tools.one_line_profile: End-to-End BIDS app for anatomical landmark regression
tools.detailed_description: A BIDS application for automatic regression of anatomical landmarks (AFIDs) in neuroimaging data.

tools.name: AFNI
tools.one_line_profile: Comprehensive software suite for analysis of functional neuroimages
tools.detailed_description: A leading software suite for the analysis, processing, and visualization of functional MRI (fMRI) and other neuroimaging data.

tools.name: FSL-scripts
tools.one_line_profile: Automation framework for FSL, Freesurfer, and AFNI
tools.detailed_description: A scripting framework to automate high-throughput processing of MRI data using FSL, Freesurfer, and AFNI in clustered environments.

tools.name: QuickNAT PyTorch
tools.one_line_profile: Fast brain MRI segmentation with uncertainty estimation
tools.detailed_description: PyTorch implementation of QuickNAT and Bayesian QuickNAT for fast whole-brain segmentation with structure-wise uncertainty quality control.

tools.name: SAME
tools.one_line_profile: Medical image registration library by Alibaba DAMO
tools.detailed_description: A library for medical image registration, supporting both affine and deformable registration tasks.

tools.name: fmri-pipeline
tools.one_line_profile: HPC-ready FSL fMRI analysis pipeline
tools.detailed_description: A Python-based pipeline for FSL fMRI data analysis designed for high-performance computing clusters with Slurm schedulers.

tools.name: fmristroke
tools.one_line_profile: Stroke-specific extensions for fMRIPrep
tools.detailed_description: A tool that adds quality checks and confound computation steps specifically tailored for stroke data processing on top of fMRIPrep.

tools.name: 3d-prostate-segmentation
tools.one_line_profile: Prostate segmentation from MRI scans
tools.detailed_description: A tool for segmenting the prostate from 3D MRI scans.

tools.name: 3D-UNet
tools.one_line_profile: PyTorch implementation of 3D U-Net for MRI segmentation
tools.detailed_description: A reusable PyTorch implementation of the 3D U-Net architecture specifically configured for 3D MRI segmentation tasks.

tools.name: MRISkullStripping
tools.one_line_profile: UNet3D model for MRI skull stripping
tools.detailed_description: A UNet3D-based model developed for accurate MRI skull stripping, trained on the Calgary Campinas dataset.

tools.name: CLAIRE
tools.one_line_profile: Constrained Large Deformation Diffeomorphic Image Registration
tools.detailed_description: A high-performance C++ solver for constrained large deformation diffeomorphic image registration.

tools.name: CT_BET
tools.one_line_profile: Robust Brain Extraction Tool (BET) specifically designed for CT head images
tools.detailed_description: A specialized tool for skull stripping in CT images, addressing the challenge of brain extraction in computed tomography data which is distinct from MRI-based methods.

tools.name: Clinica
tools.one_line_profile: Software platform for clinical neuroimaging studies management and processing
tools.detailed_description: Clinica is a software platform that makes clinical neuroimaging research easier and reproducible. It provides pipelines for processing MRI and PET data, involving tools like SPM, FreeSurfer, and FSL, and manages data in BIDS format.

tools.name: Automatic Analysis (aa)
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline system for neuroimaging data analysis in MATLAB
tools.detailed_description: Automatic Analysis (aa) is a pipeline system for neuroimaging written in MATLAB. It facilitates the construction of workflows for fMRI, MRI, and MEG/EEG analysis, integrating SPM and other tools.

tools.name: med-imagetools
tools.one_line_profile: Transparent and reproducible medical image processing pipelines
tools.detailed_description: A Python library for medical image processing, focusing on transparency and reproducibility. It provides tools for auto-segmentation, resampling, and crawling/processing medical image datasets.

tools.name: BIDS App: BROCCOLI
tools.one_line_profile: BIDS App for BROCCOLI fMRI analysis software
tools.detailed_description: A containerized BIDS Application wrapping the BROCCOLI software for parallel fMRI analysis. It allows running BROCCOLI pipelines on BIDS-formatted datasets.

tools.name: BIDS App: HCPPipelines
tools.one_line_profile: BIDS App for the Human Connectome Project (HCP) Pipelines
tools.detailed_description: A BIDS Application that executes the minimal preprocessing pipelines developed by the Human Connectome Project on BIDS-formatted data.

tools.name: BIDS App: MRtrix3_connectome
tools.one_line_profile: BIDS App for generating structural connectomes using MRtrix3
tools.detailed_description: A BIDS Application that generates subject connectomes from raw diffusion-weighted MRI data using the MRtrix3 software package, including inter-subject connection density normalisation.

tools.name: BIDS App: SPM
tools.one_line_profile: BIDS App containing the Statistical Parametric Mapping (SPM) software
tools.detailed_description: A containerized version of SPM (Statistical Parametric Mapping) designed to run on BIDS datasets. It provides a standardized environment for SPM-based neuroimaging analysis.

tools.name: BIDS App: Baracus
tools.one_line_profile: BIDS App for brain age prediction based on FreeSurfer data
tools.detailed_description: A BIDS Application that predicts brain age from FreeSurfer 5.3 output data. It wraps the Baracus model for easy deployment on BIDS datasets.

tools.name: BIDS App: FreeSurfer
tools.one_line_profile: BIDS App wrapping FreeSurfer recon-all pipeline
tools.detailed_description: A BIDS Application that runs the FreeSurfer `recon-all` pipeline on BIDS-formatted structural MRI data to generate cortical surface reconstructions and segmentations.

tools.name: giga_connectome
tools.one_line_profile: Tool to generate connectomes from fMRIPrep outputs
tools.detailed_description: A BIDS App designed to generate functional connectomes from preprocessed fMRI data (specifically fMRIPrep outputs), facilitating large-scale connectome analysis.

tools.name: BIDS App: ndmg
tools.one_line_profile: BIDS App for NeuroData's MRI to Graphs (ndmg) pipeline
tools.detailed_description: A BIDS Application wrapping the ndmg pipeline, which processes MRI data to generate connectomes (graphs) for analysis.

tools.name: BIDS App: NIAK
tools.one_line_profile: BIDS App for the Neuroimaging Analysis Kit (NIAK)
tools.detailed_description: A BIDS Application for NIAK, a pipeline for preprocessing and analysis of fMRI and structural MRI scans, typically used in Octave/MATLAB environments.

tools.name: nipypelines
tools.one_line_profile: BIDS App for preprocessing functional tasks
tools.detailed_description: A tool to preprocess functional MRI tasks in a BIDS dataset, leveraging Nipype interfaces.

tools.name: OPPNI
tools.one_line_profile: Optimization of Preprocessing Pipelines for NeuroImaging
tools.detailed_description: A BIDS App that runs fast optimization of preprocessing pipelines for BOLD fMRI, helping to select the best processing steps for a given dataset.

tools.name: rs_signal_extract
tools.one_line_profile: BIDS App for resting state signal extraction
tools.detailed_description: A BIDS Application that uses nilearn to extract signals from resting-state fMRI data, facilitating functional connectivity analysis.

tools.name: Brainlife App: FreeSurfer
tools.one_line_profile: Brainlife app for FreeSurfer segmentation
tools.detailed_description: A Brainlife.io application that wraps FreeSurfer to segment T1w anatomical data into functionally different parts of the brain.

tools.name: Brainlife App: MRtrix3 ACT
tools.one_line_profile: Brainlife app for MRtrix3 Anatomically Constrained Tractography
tools.detailed_description: A Brainlife.io application that runs MRtrix3 ACT (Anatomically Constrained Tractography) using diffusion-weighted MRI data.

tools.name: calcSulc
tools.one_line_profile: Tool to calculate sulcal morphology metrics from FreeSurfer surface outputs
tools.detailed_description: A MATLAB toolbox for calculating sulcal morphology (width, depth, etc.) from FreeSurfer surface files, facilitating morphometric analysis in neuroimaging.

tools.name: QuPath Extension Braian
tools.one_line_profile: QuPath extension for whole-brain data extraction and alignment
tools.detailed_description: A collection of tools extending QuPath for whole-brain data extraction, likely facilitating the integration of histology data with brain atlases.

tools.name: BIDS-fMRIpost
tools.one_line_profile: Post-processing pipeline for fMRI data following fMRIPrep
tools.detailed_description: A Python tool based on nilearn for basic fMRI data post-processing after fMRIPrep, including denoising, confound regression, spatial smoothing, and functional connectivity network creation.

tools.name: Liston Laboratory MultiEcho fMRI Pipeline
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for rapid precision mapping using multi-echo fMRI
tools.detailed_description: A processing pipeline developed by the Liston Laboratory for analyzing multi-echo fMRI data, enabling rapid precision mapping of individuals.

tools.name: Connectome Mapper 3
tools.one_line_profile: BIDS App for multi-modal neuroimaging processing and connectome mapping
tools.detailed_description: A BIDS App that implements full anatomical, diffusion, resting-state functional MRI, and EEG processing pipelines. It processes raw data to generate multi-resolution brain parcellations and connection matrices.

tools.name: fs2dicom
tools.one_line_profile: Converter for FreeSurfer outputs to DICOM format
tools.detailed_description: A utility tool to convert FreeSurfer segmentation and surface outputs back into DICOM format, facilitating integration with clinical PACS or other DICOM-based systems.

tools.name: fs6-cloud
tools.one_line_profile: Scripts to run FreeSurfer 6.0 in cloud environments
tools.detailed_description: A set of shell scripts and configurations to facilitate running FreeSurfer 6.0 processing pipelines in cloud computing environments.

tools.name: cosanlab_preproc
tools.one_line_profile: Nipype-based fMRI preprocessing tools
tools.detailed_description: A collection of Nipype-based tools and pipelines for fMRI data preprocessing, developed by the Cosan Lab.

tools.name: bidsMReye
tools.one_line_profile: BIDS App for decoding eye motion from fMRI data
tools.detailed_description: A BIDS App that uses deepMReye to decode eye motion directly from fMRI time series data, providing eye tracking information without a dedicated eye tracker.

tools.name: bidspm
tools.one_line_profile: SPM-centric BIDS App for neuroimaging analysis
tools.detailed_description: A BIDS App that wraps Statistical Parametric Mapping (SPM) functionality, allowing for standardized processing of BIDS-formatted neuroimaging datasets using SPM.

tools.name: mri_library
tools.one_line_profile: Library of scripts for MRI preprocessing
tools.detailed_description: A collection of shell scripts and utilities for various MRI preprocessing tasks, serving as a personal but reusable library for neuroimaging workflows.

tools.name: PyNets
tools.one_line_profile: Workflow for structural and functional connectome ensemble learning
tools.detailed_description: A reproducible workflow and software package for generating structural and functional connectomes and performing ensemble learning analysis on neuroimaging data.

tools.name: dti_preproc
tools.one_line_profile: Preprocessing scripts for diffusion tensor imaging
tools.detailed_description: A set of scripts dedicated to the preprocessing of Diffusion Tensor Imaging (DTI) data, facilitating the preparation of diffusion MRI for analysis.

tools.name: NeSVoR
tools.one_line_profile: GPU-accelerated slice-to-volume reconstruction package
tools.detailed_description: A Python package for high-quality, GPU-accelerated slice-to-volume reconstruction of fetal or other motion-corrupted MRI data.

tools.name: SALMON
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning segmentation algorithm based on MONAI
tools.detailed_description: A segmentation software developed by the QIMP team, utilizing deep learning algorithms based on the MONAI toolbox for single and multi-label segmentation of 3D medical images.

tools.name: mrtrix3-pyio
tools.one_line_profile: Python interface for MRtrix3 file formats
tools.detailed_description: A Python package that provides an interface to read and write MRtrix3 specific file formats, enabling interoperability between MRtrix3 and Python-based neuroimaging tools.

tools.name: shard-recon
tools.one_line_profile: MRtrix3 module for motion correction and reconstruction
tools.detailed_description: An MRtrix3 module designed for motion correction and scattered slice reconstruction in multi-shell diffusion MRI data.

tools.name: auto-motion-fmriprep
tools.one_line_profile: Automated motion detection using fMRIPrep confounds
tools.detailed_description: A tool written in R to automate the detection of motion artifacts in fMRI data by utilizing confound files generated by fMRIPrep.

tools.name: NeuroFormats.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Julia library for structural neuroimaging file formats
tools.detailed_description: A Julia package for reading and writing various structural neuroimaging file formats, facilitating neuroimaging analysis within the Julia programming environment.

tools.name: brainload
tools.one_line_profile: Python module for accessing FreeSurfer data
tools.detailed_description: A Python module designed to simplify the loading and access of FreeSurfer brain surface and morphometry data files for single subjects and groups.

tools.name: freesurfer_parallel_scripts
tools.one_line_profile: Scripts for parallel FreeSurfer processing
tools.detailed_description: A collection of shell scripts to execute FreeSurfer's recon-all pipeline in parallel on multi-core machines, improving processing efficiency.

tools.name: freesurferformats
tools.one_line_profile: R package for neuroimaging file formats
tools.detailed_description: An R package for reading and writing neuroimaging file formats, originally focused on FreeSurfer but expanded to support others.

tools.name: fsbrain
tools.one_line_profile: R library for structural neuroimaging visualization
tools.detailed_description: An R library that provides high-level functions to access and visualize surface-based brain morphometry data for individuals and groups.

tools.name: libfs
tools.one_line_profile: C++ library for FreeSurfer file formats
tools.detailed_description: A header-only, no-dependency C++11 library for accessing and manipulating FreeSurfer neuroimaging file formats.

tools.name: neuroformats-rs
tools.one_line_profile: Rust library for neuroimaging file formats
tools.detailed_description: A Rust library for handling structural neuroimaging file formats, enabling the development of high-performance neuroimaging tools in Rust.

tools.name: TriDFusion
tools.one_line_profile: 3D Medical Imaging Viewer
tools.detailed_description: A MATLAB-based medical imaging viewer for visualizing 3D and 4D medical imaging data, supporting fusion and multi-modal visualization.

tools.name: three-brain-js
tools.one_line_profile: Javascript engine for 3D brain model visualization
tools.detailed_description: A Javascript engine for rendering 3D brain models in the browser, used by the RAVE project for neuroimaging visualization.

tools.name: DIPY
tools.one_line_profile: Library for analysis of diffusion MRI and medical imaging
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive Python library for the analysis of 3D/4D+ medical imaging data, with a focus on diffusion MRI, computational anatomy, and structural imaging.

tools.name: neurocaps
tools.one_line_profile: Tool for Co-Activation Patterns (CAPs) analysis on fMRI
tools.detailed_description: A Python package for performing Co-Activation Patterns (CAPs) analyses on resting-state and task-based fMRI data to investigate dynamic functional connectivity.

tools.name: Medical-image-registration
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning based medical image registration toolkit
tools.detailed_description: A project and library for developing and training convolutional neural networks for medical image registration, including implementations of spatial transformer networks and various registration models.

tools.name: DunedinPACNI
tools.one_line_profile: Estimator for DunedinPACNI brain aging scores
tools.detailed_description: A tool to estimate DunedinPACNI (Pace of Aging Calculated from the Neuroimaging) scores from FreeSurfer parcellations of brain MRI data, facilitating research into brain aging.

tools.name: image-registration
tools.one_line_profile: MATLAB toolbox for medical image registration
tools.detailed_description: A MATLAB library/toolbox providing access to various image registration algorithms suitable for use with medical images, facilitating alignment tasks in neuroimaging.

tools.name: FreeSurfer
tools.one_line_profile: Comprehensive neuroimaging analysis suite
tools.detailed_description: A dominant software suite for the analysis and visualization of structural and functional neuroimaging data from cross-sectional or longitudinal studies, providing tools for cortical parcellation, segmentation, and surface reconstruction.

tools.name: SimpleReg
tools.one_line_profile: Medical image registration and processing toolkit
tools.detailed_description: A research-focused toolkit from the GIFT-Surg group providing tools for medical image registration and processing, designed to facilitate development and application of registration algorithms.

tools.name: BIDS_fMRI_analysis_nipype
tools.one_line_profile: Nipype pipeline for BIDS fMRI analysis
tools.detailed_description: An analysis pipeline for fMRI and structural images formatted according to BIDS (Brain Imaging Data Structure), utilizing the Nipype framework for workflow management.

tools.name: brain-tumor-mri-dataset
tools.one_line_profile: Utilities for Brain Tumor MRI Dataset access
tools.detailed_description: A utility library to download and load MRI brain tumor datasets, providing easy access to 2D slices, tumor masks, and tumor classes for machine learning research.

tools.name: scikit-opt
tools.one_line_profile: Swarm Intelligence Optimization Library
tools.detailed_description: A Python library implementing various heuristic optimization algorithms including Genetic Algorithm, Particle Swarm Optimization, Simulated Annealing, and Ant Colony Optimization, widely used for scientific parameter optimization.

tools.name: DFMIR
tools.one_line_profile: Unsupervised multi-modal medical image registration via discriminator-free image-to-image translation
tools.detailed_description: An implementation of an unsupervised method for multi-modal medical image registration that utilizes discriminator-free image-to-image translation to align anatomical structures across different imaging modalities.

tools.name: Co-BioNet
tools.one_line_profile: Uncertainty-guided dual-views for semi-supervised volumetric medical image segmentation
tools.detailed_description: A PyTorch implementation of a semi-supervised learning framework for volumetric medical image segmentation that leverages uncertainty-guided dual-views to improve performance with limited labeled data.

tools.name: VT-UNet
tools.one_line_profile: Volumetric transformer for accurate 3D tumor segmentation
tools.detailed_description: A robust volumetric transformer-based network (VT-UNet) designed for accurate 3D tumor segmentation in medical images, combining the strengths of transformers and U-Net architectures.

tools.name: RegUn
tools.one_line_profile: Quantitative error prediction of medical image registration using regression forests
tools.detailed_description: A tool for estimating the quantitative error of medical image registration processes using regression forests, aiding in the quality control of registration results.

tools.name: tigerbx
tools.one_line_profile: Deep-learning framework for MRI segmentation
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning framework designed for the segmentation of MRI data, providing tools for processing and analyzing brain imaging structures.

tools.name: mri-braintumor-segmentation
tools.one_line_profile: MRI Brain Tumor Segmentation model for BraTS Challenge 2020
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning model implementation for the BraTS 2020 challenge, focused on segmenting brain tumors from MRI scans.

tools.name: Recursive Cascaded Networks
tools.one_line_profile: Recursive Cascaded Networks for Unsupervised Medical Image Registration
tools.detailed_description: An implementation of recursive cascaded networks designed for unsupervised medical image registration, enabling progressive alignment of anatomical structures.

tools.name: lddmm-ot
tools.one_line_profile: Optimal Transport for Diffeomorphic Registration
tools.detailed_description: A Python implementation of the LDDMM (Large Deformation Diffeomorphic Metric Mapping) algorithm using Optimal Transport, as presented in MICCAI 2017.

tools.name: TermHub
tools.one_line_profile: Web app and CLI tools for working with biomedical terminologies
tools.detailed_description: A set of tools (CLI and Web) for managing and working with biomedical terminologies, developed by JHU BIDS, facilitating data standardization in neuroimaging.

tools.name: RAN
tools.one_line_profile: Residual Aligner-based Network for coarse-to-fine discontinuous deformable registration
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of the Residual Aligner-based Network (RAN), a motion-aware structure for performing coarse-to-fine discontinuous deformable medical image registration.

tools.name: RNiftyReg
tools.one_line_profile: R interface to the NiftyReg medical image registration library
tools.detailed_description: An R package providing an interface to the NiftyReg library, enabling medical image registration and manipulation directly within the R statistical environment.

tools.name: LiviaNET
tools.one_line_profile: 3D fully convolutional neural network for subcortical segmentation in MRI
tools.detailed_description: A 3D fully convolutional neural network (LiviaNET) designed for the segmentation of subcortical structures in MRI scans.

tools.name: SemiDenseNet
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning network for infant brain segmentation
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning model (SemiDenseNet) developed for the segmentation of infant brains from MRI data, as used in the iSEG Grand MICCAI Challenge 2017.

tools.name: BraTS18-Challege
tools.one_line_profile: Multimodal Brain Tumor Segmentation Challenge 2018 implementation
tools.detailed_description: Code repository for the Multimodal Brain Tumor Segmentation Challenge 2018, providing models and tools for segmenting brain tumors from multimodal MRI data.

tools.name: TransMorph
tools.one_line_profile: Transformer for Unsupervised Medical Image Registration
tools.detailed_description: A state-of-the-art framework using Transformers for unsupervised medical image registration, offering superior performance in capturing long-range dependencies compared to traditional CNNs.

tools.name: ViT-V-Net
tools.one_line_profile: Vision Transformer for 3D medical image registration
tools.detailed_description: An implementation of Vision Transformer (ViT) integrated with V-Net for 3D medical image registration tasks, leveraging self-attention mechanisms for alignment.

tools.name: deepflash
tools.one_line_profile: Supervised Predictive Medical Image Registration Model
tools.detailed_description: A supervised deep learning model for predictive medical image registration, designed to efficiently align medical images.

tools.name: hippunfold
tools.one_line_profile: Automated hippocampal unfolding and subfield segmentation
tools.detailed_description: A BIDS App for automated unfolding and subfield segmentation of the hippocampus, facilitating advanced structural analysis of this brain region.

tools.name: scattr
tools.one_line_profile: BIDS App for structural connectivity mapping between targeted regions
tools.detailed_description: A BIDS App that computes structural connectivity between targeted regions of interest (ROIs) using diffusion MRI data. It facilitates the analysis of neural pathways by automating the tractography and connectivity matrix generation process within the BIDS ecosystem.

tools.name: erwin
tools.one_line_profile: Quantitative MRI toolbox for Python
tools.detailed_description: A Python toolbox designed for quantitative MRI (qMRI) analysis, providing functions for handling and processing MRI data to extract quantitative parameters.

tools.name: SlicerElastix
tools.one_line_profile: Elastix medical image registration extension for 3D Slicer
tools.detailed_description: An extension for 3D Slicer that integrates the Elastix medical image registration toolkit, allowing users to perform complex image registration tasks directly within the Slicer environment.

tools.name: SlicerHDBrainExtraction
tools.one_line_profile: HD-BET brain extraction extension for 3D Slicer
tools.detailed_description: A 3D Slicer extension that provides an interface to the HD-BET (High-Definition Brain Extraction Tool), enabling robust skull stripping of brain MRI images using deep learning.

tools.name: bet2
tools.one_line_profile: Standalone implementation of the Brain Extraction Tool (BET2)
tools.detailed_description: A standalone C++ implementation of the Brain Extraction Tool (BET2), originally part of FSL, used for segmenting brain tissue from non-brain tissue in whole-head images.

tools.name: csg_mri_pipelines
tools.one_line_profile: MRI preprocessing and analysis pipelines for consciousness disorders
tools.detailed_description: A collection of MRI preprocessing and analysis pipelines specifically designed for the study of disorders of consciousness, automating workflows for structural and functional MRI data.

tools.name: BrainFusion
tools.one_line_profile: Platform for analyzing multimodal physiological signals (EEG, fNIRS, etc.)
tools.detailed_description: An open-source Python platform for analyzing multimodal physiological signals including EEG, EMG, ECG, and fNIRS. It supports preprocessing, feature extraction, and physiological signal coupling analysis, and is BIDS-compliant.

tools.name: ICA-AROMA
tools.one_line_profile: Tool for removing motion artifacts from fMRI data using ICA
tools.detailed_description: A data-driven method to identify and remove head motion-related artifacts from functional MRI data using Independent Component Analysis (ICA). It is a standard tool for fMRI denoising.

tools.name: PyHIST
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for histological image tissue segmentation
tools.detailed_description: A pipeline tool designed to segment tissue from the background in histological images, facilitating automated analysis of whole slide images.

tools.name: ImageRegistration
tools.one_line_profile: Medical image registration tool using Mutual Information
tools.detailed_description: A C++ implementation for medical image registration based on Mutual Information, providing a solver for aligning medical images.

tools.name: brain-segmentation-pytorch
tools.one_line_profile: U-Net implementation for brain MRI segmentation
tools.detailed_description: A widely used PyTorch implementation of U-Net specifically configured for FLAIR abnormality segmentation in brain MRI, serving as a reference tool and library for deep learning-based segmentation.

tools.name: trampolino
tools.one_line_profile: CLI tool for brain tractography pipelines
tools.detailed_description: TRAMPOLINO (TRActography Meta-Pipeline cOmmand LINe tOol) is a command-line interface that leverages Nipype to reconstruct orientation distribution functions and perform streamline tracking using existing software toolboxes.

tools.name: SegmentAnyBone
tools.one_line_profile: Universal model for bone segmentation in MRI
tools.detailed_description: A foundation-model-based tool capable of segmenting any bone at any location in MRI scans, providing a robust solution for musculoskeletal image analysis.

tools.name: QMRITools
tools.one_line_profile: Quantitative MRI processing and visualization toolbox
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive toolbox for Mathematica containing various tools for processing, analyzing, and visualizing quantitative MRI data, including diffusion and perfusion imaging.

tools.name: fmriflows
tools.one_line_profile: Consortium of fMRI analysis pipelines
tools.detailed_description: A collection of fMRI analysis pipelines covering anatomical and functional preprocessing, univariate analysis, and multivariate pattern analysis, designed to standardize fMRI workflows.

tools.name: parcellation_fragmenter
tools.one_line_profile: Tool to fragment FreeSurfer parcellations
tools.detailed_description: A utility tool that fragments FreeSurfer parcellation annotations into N-equal sized parcels, useful for fine-grained connectivity analysis or ROI generation.

tools.name: petprep_extract_tacs
tools.one_line_profile: BIDS App for extracting PET time activity curves
tools.detailed_description: A BIDS App designed to extract time activity curves (TACs) from PET data, facilitating kinetic modeling and quantitative analysis in a standardized BIDS workflow.

tools.name: SegNetCMR
tools.one_line_profile: Tensorflow implementation of SegNet for cardiac MRI segmentation
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning based tool implementing the SegNet architecture specifically optimized for segmenting cardiac MRI images.

tools.name: PyDesigner
tools.one_line_profile: Hands-free preprocessing pipeline for diffusion MRI (DTI, DKI, FBI, FBWM)
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive Python-based pipeline for the preprocessing and parameter estimation of various diffusion MRI modalities including DTI and DKI, designed for ease of use and reproducibility.

tools.name: freesurfer (R)
tools.one_line_profile: R interface for FreeSurfer neuroimaging software
tools.detailed_description: An R package that provides an interface to the FreeSurfer software suite, allowing users to run FreeSurfer commands and analyze results directly within the R environment.

tools.name: fslr
tools.one_line_profile: R interface for FSL (FMRIB Software Library)
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive R package that wraps FSL functions, enabling neuroimaging analysis, image processing, and statistical operations using FSL tools from within R.

tools.name: robex (R)
tools.one_line_profile: R interface for ROBEX (Robust Brain Extraction)
tools.detailed_description: An R wrapper for the ROBEX tool, providing robust skull stripping and brain extraction capabilities for MRI data within the R ecosystem.

tools.name: amid
tools.one_line_profile: Awesome Medical Imaging Datasets library
tools.detailed_description: A Python library that provides a unified interface for loading and handling various medical imaging datasets, simplifying data access for research.

tools.name: MRIcro
tools.one_line_profile: Volume renderer for medical images (NIfTI, DICOM, etc.)
tools.detailed_description: A visualization tool for viewing medical images in various formats (NIfTI, DICOM, etc.) with support for volume rendering and overlay capabilities.

tools.name: Surf Ice
tools.one_line_profile: GLSL surface rendering tool for neuroimaging
tools.detailed_description: A fast and versatile surface renderer for neuroimaging data, supporting various mesh formats and tractography visualization.

tools.name: Brainchop
tools.one_line_profile: In-browser 3D MRI rendering and segmentation tool
tools.detailed_description: A web-based tool for 3D MRI visualization and segmentation that runs entirely in the browser using WebGL and TensorFlow.js.

tools.name: BraTS-Toolkit
tools.one_line_profile: Toolkit for glioma MRI preprocessing and segmentation
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive toolkit for the preprocessing, segmentation, and fusion of glioma MRI scans, developed in the context of the BraTS challenges.

tools.name: TotalSpineSeg
tools.one_line_profile: Robust segmentation of spinal structures in MRI
tools.detailed_description: A tool for the robust segmentation and labeling of vertebrae, intervertebral discs, spinal cord, and spinal canal in MRI images using nnU-Net.

tools.name: ephypype
tools.one_line_profile: Electrophysiology analysis pipelines for Nipype
tools.detailed_description: A Python package providing pipelines for electrophysiology (EEG/MEG) analysis, designed to integrate with the Nipype framework.

tools.name: graphpype
tools.one_line_profile: Graph theoretical analysis pipelines for neuroimaging
tools.detailed_description: A Python package for graph theoretical analysis of neuroimaging data, compatible with ephypype and nipype workflows.

tools.name: dMRIPrep
tools.one_line_profile: Preprocessing pipeline for diffusion MRI
tools.detailed_description: A robust and easy-to-use pipeline for preprocessing diverse diffusion MRI (dMRI) data, ensuring reproducibility and minimal manual intervention.

tools.name: eddymotion
tools.one_line_profile: Eddy-current and head-motion correction for dMRI
tools.detailed_description: An open-source tool for correcting eddy currents and head motion in diffusion MRI data, part of the NiPreps ecosystem.

tools.name: fMRIPost-AROMA
tools.one_line_profile: ICA-AROMA runner for fMRIPrep derivatives
tools.detailed_description: A tool to run ICA-AROMA (Independent Component Analysis-based Automatic Removal Of Motion Artifacts) on data preprocessed with fMRIPrep.

tools.name: fMRIPrep
tools.one_line_profile: Robust preprocessing pipeline for fMRI data
tools.detailed_description: A widely used, robust, and transparent pipeline for preprocessing functional MRI (fMRI) data, designed to handle diverse datasets with minimal manual intervention.

tools.name: fMRIPrep-rodents
tools.one_line_profile: fMRIPrep adapted for rodent imaging
tools.detailed_description: An adaptation of the fMRIPrep pipeline specifically tailored for preprocessing rodent fMRI data.

tools.name: Nibabies
tools.one_line_profile: Preprocessing workflow for neonate and infant MRI
tools.detailed_description: A robust and transparent preprocessing workflow tailored specifically for the challenges of neonate and infant MRI data.

tools.name: NiFreeze
tools.one_line_profile: Volume-wise artifact estimation and correction
tools.detailed_description: A framework for estimating and correcting volume-wise artifacts in 4D neuroimaging data (dMRI, fMRI, PET).

tools.name: nondefaced-detector
tools.one_line_profile: Tool to detect non-defaced MRI datasets
tools.detailed_description: A utility to identify MRI datasets that have not been properly defaced, aiding in privacy protection and quality control before data publication.

tools.name: sMRIPrep
tools.one_line_profile: Structural MRI preprocessing workflow
tools.detailed_description: A preprocessing pipeline for structural MRI data, serving as a component of the NiPreps ecosystem.

tools.name: Nipype
tools.one_line_profile: Neuroimaging in Python: Pipelines and Interfaces
tools.detailed_description: A foundational Python framework that provides a uniform interface to existing neuroimaging software (FSL, SPM, FreeSurfer, etc.) and facilitates the creation of analysis workflows.

tools.name: pydra-nipype1
tools.one_line_profile: Bridge between Nipype 1 interfaces and Pydra
tools.detailed_description: A tool for importing and using legacy Nipype 1 interfaces within the newer Pydra dataflow engine.

tools.name: PALS
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for Analysing Lesions after Stroke
tools.detailed_description: A scalable toolbox designed to facilitate standardised analysis and quality control in stroke research using T1-weighted MRIs.

tools.name: Segmentator
tools.one_line_profile: 3D MRI data exploration and segmentation tool
tools.detailed_description: A Python-based tool for exploring and segmenting 3D MRI data, designed for ease of use in neuroimaging research.

tools.name: DeepPrep
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning empowered neuroimaging preprocessing pipeline
tools.detailed_description: A scalable and robust pipeline for neuroimaging preprocessing (fMRI/sMRI) that leverages deep learning algorithms for acceleration and performance improvement.

tools.name: Banksy_py
tools.one_line_profile: Spatial clustering algorithm for cell-typing and tissue domain segmentation
tools.detailed_description: A Python package implementing the BANKSY algorithm for spatial transcriptomics analysis, unifying cell type identification and tissue domain segmentation.

tools.name: Platipy
tools.one_line_profile: Processing Library and Analysis Toolkit for Medical Imaging
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive Python library for medical image processing and analysis, often used in radiotherapy and quantitative imaging workflows.

tools.name: Greedy
tools.one_line_profile: Fast greedy diffeomorphic registration tool
tools.detailed_description: A fast CPU-based implementation of greedy diffeomorphic registration for medical images, often used as a lightweight alternative to ANTs SyN.

tools.name: BrainPrep
tools.one_line_profile: Preprocessing pipeline for Brain MR Images
tools.detailed_description: A Python-based preprocessing pipeline integrating FSL and ANTs for tasks including registration, skull-stripping, bias field correction, and segmentation.

tools.name: graynet
tools.one_line_profile: Extraction of subject-wise networks from structural MRI
tools.detailed_description: A tool for extracting single-subject morphological networks from structural MRI features (thickness, curvature, etc.) for network neuroscience analysis.

tools.name: mrivis
tools.one_line_profile: Medical image visualization library
tools.detailed_description: A development toolkit and library for visualizing medical imaging data, tailored for neuroimaging workflows.

tools.name: VisualQC
tools.one_line_profile: Quality control workflow tool for neuroimaging data
tools.detailed_description: An assistive tool designed to ease the manual quality control (QC) process of neuroimaging data, providing visual interfaces for inspecting registration and segmentation accuracy.

tools.name: Raidionics
tools.one_line_profile: Automatic segmentation and reporting for brain tumors
tools.detailed_description: Software for automatic segmentation of brain tumors from MRI volumes and generation of standardized clinical reports.

tools.name: conn_tools
tools.one_line_profile: Utilities for CONN Toolbox results extraction
tools.detailed_description: A collection of tools to facilitate the extraction and visualization of second-level ROI-to-ROI connectivity results from the CONN Toolbox.

tools.name: iCellR
tools.one_line_profile: R package for single-cell sequencing data analysis
tools.detailed_description: An interactive R package for analyzing and visualizing high-throughput single-cell sequencing data (scRNA-seq, scATAC-seq, etc.).

tools.name: xreg
tools.one_line_profile: Medical image registration library (2D/3D)
tools.detailed_description: A C++ library and executables for medical image modeling and registration, with emphasis on intraoperative fluoroscopic (X-ray) to 3D registration.

tools.name: bids-tools
tools.one_line_profile: Utilities for BIDS neuroimaging data structure
tools.detailed_description: A set of tools for managing and interacting with neuroimaging data organized according to the Brain Imaging Data Structure (BIDS).

tools.name: FireANTs
tools.one_line_profile: Adaptive Riemannian Optimization for Diffeomorphic Registration
tools.detailed_description: A registration tool implementing adaptive Riemannian optimization for multi-scale diffeomorphic registration, offering high-performance alignment.

tools.name: MRIcroGL
tools.one_line_profile: GLSL-based volume rendering and visualization tool
tools.detailed_description: A powerful visualization tool for viewing NIfTI, DICOM, and other medical image formats using hardware-accelerated volume rendering.

tools.name: PyPREP
tools.one_line_profile: Python implementation of the Preprocessing Pipeline (PREP) for EEG data
tools.detailed_description: PyPREP is a Python implementation of the PREP pipeline for EEG data preprocessing. It focuses on identifying and interpolating bad channels, referencing, and ensuring data quality for downstream analysis.

tools.name: Multi-Scale Brain Parcellator
tools.one_line_profile: BIDS App for anatomical MRI processing and multi-scale parcellation
tools.detailed_description: A BIDS App that implements a full anatomical MRI processing pipeline, performing structural brain parcellation at five different scales. It is part of the Connectome Mapping Toolkit (CMTK).

tools.name: Shimming Toolbox
tools.one_line_profile: Toolbox for static, dynamic, and real-time MRI shimming
tools.detailed_description: A software package for performing static, dynamic, and real-time shimming using external and internal MRI shim coils to improve magnetic field homogeneity.

tools.name: pTFCE
tools.one_line_profile: Probabilistic Threshold-Free Cluster Enhancement for neuroimaging
tools.detailed_description: An R package implementing Probabilistic Threshold-Free Cluster Enhancement (pTFCE), a method for cluster-based statistical analysis of neuroimaging data that improves sensitivity and interpretability.

tools.name: presurfer
tools.one_line_profile: Preprocessing scripts to prepare MP2RAGE data for FreeSurfer
tools.detailed_description: A set of MATLAB scripts designed to preprocess MP2RAGE MRI data (removing background noise, creating synthetic MPRAGE contrasts) to make it compatible with FreeSurfer's standard pipeline.

tools.name: OPPNI
tools.one_line_profile: Optimization of Preprocessing Pipelines for NeuroImaging
tools.detailed_description: A pipeline optimization tool for fMRI preprocessing, developed by the Strother Lab. It focuses on evaluating and selecting the optimal preprocessing steps to maximize signal quality and reproducibility.

tools.name: PhLEM Toolbox
tools.one_line_profile: Physiological Log Extraction for Modeling in fMRI
tools.detailed_description: A MATLAB toolbox for extracting physiological recordings (heart rate, respiration) during MRI scanning and estimating signal phases for use as covariates in GLM analysis of functional brain imaging.

tools.name: Aladdin
tools.one_line_profile: Joint Atlas Building and Diffeomorphic Registration Learning
tools.detailed_description: A tool for joint atlas building and diffeomorphic registration learning with pairwise alignment, developed by the UNC Biomedical Image Analysis Group.

tools.name: PStrip
tools.one_line_profile: PCA Model for Brain Extraction
tools.detailed_description: A brain extraction (skull stripping) tool based on a PCA model, developed by the UNC Biomedical Image Analysis Group.

tools.name: uniGradICON
tools.one_line_profile: Foundation Model for Medical Image Registration
tools.detailed_description: A foundation model for medical image registration that provides general-purpose, high-performance registration capabilities across various modalities and anatomical regions.

tools.name: UNSEG
tools.one_line_profile: Unsupervised segmentation of cells and nuclei in tissue samples
tools.detailed_description: A tool for unsupervised segmentation of cells and nuclei in complex tissue samples, developed by the Uttam Lab.

tools.name: collagen-fiber-metrics
tools.one_line_profile: Deep generative models for collagen fiber centerline segmentation
tools.detailed_description: A tool using deep generative models for the segmentation and extraction of collagen fiber centerlines in tissue images, developed by the UW LOCI lab.

tools.name: brainextractor
tools.one_line_profile: Brain Extraction Tool implemented in Python
tools.detailed_description: A Python implementation of a brain extraction tool (BET) for skull stripping MRI images, providing a reusable library/CLI for this common preprocessing step.

tools.name: AssemblyNet
tools.one_line_profile: 3D Whole Brain MRI segmentation pipeline
tools.detailed_description: A pipeline for whole brain MRI segmentation, designed to process 3D MRI data for structural analysis and segmentation tasks.

tools.name: TotalSegmentator
tools.one_line_profile: Robust segmentation of anatomical structures in CT and MR images
tools.detailed_description: A robust tool for automated segmentation of over 100 important anatomical structures in CT and MRI images, widely used in medical image analysis.

tools.name: DeepBET
tools.one_line_profile: Fast brain extraction using neural networks
tools.detailed_description: A neural network-based tool for fast and accurate brain extraction (skull stripping) from MRI scans, serving as a preprocessing step.

tools.name: DeepMRIPrep
tools.one_line_profile: Neural network-based MRI preprocessing pipeline
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive MRI preprocessing pipeline leveraging neural networks to accelerate image preparation steps such as registration and segmentation.

tools.name: EMLDDMM
tools.one_line_profile: Robust medical image registration using EM-LDDMM
tools.detailed_description: A tool for robust medical image registration using Expectation-Maximization Large Deformation Diffeomorphic Metric Mapping, capable of handling differing contrasts and missing data.

tools.name: SAT-DS
tools.one_line_profile: Toolkit for building the SAT-DS medical segmentation dataset collection
tools.detailed_description: A repository providing code and workflows to standardize and build the SAT-DS collection, aggregating over 72 public segmentation datasets across modalities like MRI, CT, and PET.
